title: Hi, I’m Rozalyn Hagan
text:
Welcome to my digital space! I’m a third-year marketing student with a passion for for consumer behavior, asserting creative strategies, and a love for promotions and bringing brands to life through meaningful storytelling. Whether it’s crafting campaigns, analyzing market trends, or building brand identities, I thrive on turning ideas into impact.


I am in the process of earning my B.A. in Marketing with an emphasis in entertainment from Cal Poly Pomona. I started my college journey at Citrus College where I found my love for marketing, especially in the entertainment industry. I one day hope to work for The Walt Disney Company and create fun and exciting content for the parks.


You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

title: Hi, I’m Rozalyn Hagan

title: Hi, I’m Rozalyn Hagan
text: You can email me or connect on LinkedIn.

title: Strategic Marketing
text: Below are selected projects that showcase my work in strategic marketing, campaign development, and brand management. These examples highlight how I apply leadership, data-informed decision making, and creative direction to drive marketing success.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 1: Strategic Campaign Planning]
In this project, I led the development of a comprehensive marketing campaign for [product, service, or initiative]. From audience segmentation to messaging strategy, I managed the full lifecycle of the campaign, aligning it with business objectives and measurable KPIs.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Strategy: Defined objectives and tactics for maximum impact.
Team Coordination: Oversaw collaboration across creative, data, and channel teams.
Performance Tracking: Implemented real-time metrics and post-campaign analysis.
Brand Positioning: Ensured consistency across all touchpoints.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 2: Brand Audit & Positioning]
This initiative involved conducting a full brand audit for [organization or brand], evaluating its current market perception, competitive landscape, and customer engagement. I synthesized insights into a refreshed brand strategy and visual identity recommendations.
Skills Demonstrated:

Brand Analysis: Audited messaging, tone, and visual identity.
Competitive Benchmarking: Evaluated brand positioning within the market.
Strategic Communication: Developed new value propositions and storytelling elements.
Stakeholder Presentation: Delivered recommendations to senior leadership.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 3: Product Launch Go-to-Market Plan]
For the release of [new product/service], I created a go-to-market (GTM) strategy from scratch. This included customer journey mapping, channel mix planning, and launch timeline coordination.
Skills Demonstrated:

Go-to-Market Strategy: Developed a clear launch roadmap aligned with buyer needs.
Integrated Marketing: Orchestrated email, paid ads, social, and on-site promotions.
Budget Management: Allocated resources efficiently across tactics.
Launch Optimization: Tracked performance and refined tactics in real time.

title: Strategic Marketing
text:
[Project Title 4: Client Consulting & Campaign Optimization]
I collaborated with a client to assess and optimize their existing marketing efforts. Through audits, persona development, and campaign refinement, I helped improve ROI and audience engagement.
Skills Demonstrated:

Client Consulting: Provided clear insights and strategic guidance.
Persona Development: Built target personas to guide messaging.
Campaign Optimization: Identified and addressed areas of underperformance.
Data-Driven Adjustments: Leveraged analytics to refine tactics.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected projects that highlight my experience applying marketing analytics to real-world challenges. These projects reflect my ability to combine statistical tools, campaign data, and strategic thinking to inform decisions and drive results.
Whether developing dashboards, analyzing campaign performance, or uncovering insights through SEO and web analytics, each project is rooted in turning complex marketing data into clear, actionable strategies.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Campaign Performance Analysis: Evaluating the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts using data.
Data Visualization: Turning raw datasets into intuitive dashboards and reports.
Marketing Mix & Attribution: Exploring how different channels contribute to success.
Customer & Market Insights: Using analytics to better understand user behavior and optimize experiences.

title: Resume
text:
You can view a PDF version of my resume here.

Professional Summary
Results-oriented marketing and promotions student with a strong foundation in data analysis, digital strategy, and event coordination focuses. Skilled in social media tools and creative design to bring emphasis to brands and their image.


Technical Skills

Programming Languages: R

Web Technologies: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, Quarto, CMS Platforms, Analytics Tools, Adobe Creative Suit and InDesign

title: Marketing Analytics
section: Project Title 1: Consumer Insights Dashboard Design
text:
Project Title 1: Consumer Insights Dashboard Design
In this project, I created an interactive dashboard using Google Data Studio to analyze customer behavior data for an e-commerce brand. The goal was to uncover actionable insights on purchasing patterns, churn risk, and customer lifetime value.
Skills Demonstrated:

Data Analysis: Cleaned and interpreted data from Google Analytics and Shopify reports.
Dashboard Development: Designed a user-friendly, real-time dashboard for marketing stakeholders.
Customer Segmentation: Identified high-value segments based on behavior and engagement metrics.
Insight Communication: Presented findings to non-technical stakeholders in a visual, compelling format.

title: Marketing Analytics
section: Project Title 2: A/B Testing for Landing Page Optimization
text:
Project Title 2: A/B Testing for Landing Page Optimization
This project focused on improving conversion rates for a mock product landing page. I designed and ran an A/B test using simulated traffic data to evaluate the impact of different headline copy and CTA buttons.
Skills Demonstrated:

Experiment Design: Created hypotheses, testing criteria, and success metrics.
Statistical Analysis: Used Excel and basic Python to interpret test results and determine significance.
User Behavior Insight: Analyzed heatmaps and bounce rates to inform design choices.
Optimization Strategy: Recommended data-backed changes that improved conversion rate by 12%.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: Project Title 1: Strategic Brand Revitalization for Student Startup
text:
Project Title 1: Strategic Brand Revitalization for Student Startup
In this project, I led a rebranding initiative for a campus-based sustainable fashion startup. The objective was to reposition the brand to better resonate with Gen Z values and increase engagement across digital platforms.
Skills Demonstrated:

Brand Strategy: Conducted brand audits and competitor analysis to redefine the brand voice and identity.
Market Research: Used surveys and focus groups to inform positioning and messaging.
Creative Direction: Guided visual identity updates and content creation across social media.
Campaign Planning: Developed a 3-month rollout strategy that increased Instagram engagement by 45%.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: Project Title 2: Integrated Campaign for Mental Health Awareness
text:
Project Title 2: Integrated Campaign for Mental Health Awareness
This campaign was part of a student-led initiative to raise awareness of mental health resources on campus. I spearheaded the campaign strategy, ensuring alignment between messaging, timing, and outreach channels.
Skills Demonstrated:

Campaign Strategy: Defined goals, audience personas, and messaging pillars.
Cross-Channel Coordination: Managed rollout across email, social, posters, and events.
Data-Informed Decisions: Measured performance using engagement metrics and survey feedback.
Team Leadership: Coordinated with designers, writers, and PR to ensure consistency.
